languages.text:
Arbitrator recieves {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Swift Judgement{/g} and {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Ruthless Supression{/g} abilities.
Shield Bash now deals additional {uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% more damage and automatically critically hits enemies that are either prone or immobilized.
Enemies under the effect of Stalwart Defense have their damage reduced by -{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%, while counterattacks deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% additional damage.

traits.locale_text:
Arbitrator recieves {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Breakthrough{/g} and {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Ruthless Supression{/g} abilities.
Shield Bash now deals additional {uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% more damage and automatically critically hits enemies that are either prone or immobilized.
Enemies under the effect of Stalwart Defense have their damage reduced by -{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%, while counterattacks deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% additional damage.

languages.text:
The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Assault Onslaught{/g} and {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Ruthless Suppression{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

Enemies suffering the {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}stalwart defence{/g} effect deal −{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% less damage, and the Arbitrator's counter-attacks against them deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% more damage.
languages.original_text:
Арбитр получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Штурмовой натиск{/g} и {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Безжалостное подавление{/g}.
{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Удар щитом{/g} наносит на {uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, а попадание этой атакой по {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинутым{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженным{/g} целям всегда считается {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
Противники под действием эффекта {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}стойкая оборона{/g} наносят на {uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% меньше урона, а контратаки арбитра по ним наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% больше урона.

languages.text:

{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g} artık +%{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilen{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olan düşmanlara yüzde yüz {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirir.
{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Kaya gibi savunma{/g} etkisinden muzdarip düşmanlar, %{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} daha az hasar verirken Yargıcı'nın onlara yaptığı karşı saldırıları +%{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} daha fazla hasar verir.

traits.locale_text:
Yargıcı, {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Şiddetli Akın{/g} ve {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}İnsafsız Baskı{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerini{/g} kazanır.
{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g} artık +%{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilen{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olan düşmanlara yüzde yüz {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirir.
{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Kaya gibi savunma{/g} etkisinden muzdarip düşmanlar, %{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} daha az hasar verirken Yargıcı'nın onlara yaptığı karşı saldırıları +%{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} daha fazla hasar verir.

Yargıcı, {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Şiddetli Akın{/g} ve {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}İnsafsız Baskı{/g} kabiliyetlerini kazanır.
{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g} artık +%{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} daha fazla hasar verir ve yere devrilen veya felç olan düşmanlara yüzde yüz kritik vuruş indirir.
{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Dört Yandan Savunma{/g} etkisinden muzdarip düşmanlar, %{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} daha az hasar verirken Yargıcı'nın onlara yaptığı karşı saldırıları +%{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} daha fazla hasar verir.

languages.text:
El Arbitrator gana las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Acometida de asalto{/g} y {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Represión despiadada{/g}.
Ahora {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Golpe de escudo{/g} inflige un +{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y garantiza {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g} contra enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}.
Los enemigos que estén bajo el efecto de {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Defensa inexpugnable{/g} infligen un −{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % menos de daño, y los contraataques del Arbitrator contra ellos les infligen un +{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % más de daño.

languages.text:
法务官获得{g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}冲锋猛袭{/g}与{g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}无情压制{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。
{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}盾牌猛击{/g}攻击{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%，且必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
所有受到{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}坚定防御{/g}效果影响的敌人，造成的伤害降低{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%，法务官反击受影响的敌人时，造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%。
languages.original_text:
The Arbitrator gains the {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Assault Onslaught{/g} and {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Ruthless Suppression{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} now deals +{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and scores guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} enemies.
Enemies suffering the {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}stalwart defence{/g} effect deal −{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% less damage, and the Arbitrator's counter-attacks against them deal +{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}% more damage.

languages.text:
L'arbitrator obtient les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Charge offensive{/g} et {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Suppression impitoyable{/g}.
{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Coup de bouclier{/g} inflige désormais +{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et porte toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} aux ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysés{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisés{/g}.
Les ennemis sous l'effet de {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Défense inébranlable{/g} infligent −{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % de dégâts et les contre-attaques de l'arbitrator leur infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % de dégâts.

Les ennemis sous l'effet d'{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Omnidéfense{/g} infligent −{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % de dégâts et les contre-attaques de l'arbitrator leur infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % de dégâts.

languages.text:
アービトレイターは、{g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}襲撃的な猛攻{/g}および{g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}容赦のない抑圧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を付与される。
{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}の敵に対しては必ず{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。
{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}鉄壁の防御{/g}の効果下にある敵は与えるダメージが−{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%減少し、アービトレイターのそれらに対する反撃のダメージは+{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%増加する。

{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}オールラウンドディフェンス{/g}の効果下にある敵は与えるダメージが−{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%減少し、アービトレイターのそれらに対する反撃のダメージは+{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%増加する。

アービトレイターは、{g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}襲撃的な猛攻{/g}および{g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}容赦のない抑圧{/g}アビリティを付与される。
{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}ダメージが{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%増加し、脆弱化または移動不可の敵に対しては必ずクリティカルヒットになる。
{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}オールラウンドディフェンス{/g}の効果下にある敵は与えるダメージが−{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%減少し、アービトレイターのそれらに対する反撃のダメージは+{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1}%増加する。

languages.text:
Der Arbitrator erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Sturmlauf{/g} und {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Gnadenlose Unterdrückung{/g}.
{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Schildstoß{/g} verursacht jetzt +{uip|ShieldDamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und fügt {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmten{/g} Gegnern garantierte {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g} zu.
Mit dem Effekt {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Standhafte Verteidigung{/g} belegte Gegner verursachen -{uip|DamageReduction |3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % weniger Schaden. Die Gegenangriffe des Arbitrators gegen sie verursachen +{uip|DamageBonus|3ef2ffb9a92b4e4b9cde5371644e95d1} % mehr Schaden.
